title: 6.5.9 Create backend chat and document endpoints
body:
## Parent Issue
#27 - 6.5 Chat Interface + Dashboard UI

## Objective
Create backend API endpoints for chat and documents.

## Chat Endpoints
- POST /api/v1/chat/message - Send message (non-streaming)
- POST /api/v1/chat/stream - Initiate streaming response
- GET /api/v1/chat/stream/:id - SSE endpoint
- GET /api/v1/chat/conversations - List conversations
- GET /api/v1/chat/conversations/:id - Get messages
- DELETE /api/v1/chat/conversations/:id - Delete

## Document Endpoints
- POST /api/v1/documents/upload - Upload file
- GET /api/v1/documents - List documents
- DELETE /api/v1/documents/:id - Delete

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/chat.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/documents.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/chat.py`
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/document.py`

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] All endpoints work
- [ ] SSE streaming functional
- [ ] File upload saves to storage
- [ ] Conversations persist

## Estimated Time
4 hours
